### Load libraries
```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)

```

### Load Data
```{r}
# B survival
B_growth <- read_xlsx("/Users/graceleuchtenberger/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Documents/project-gigas-conditioning-GL/data/sizes/B_2023POGS_small_seed_daily/B_sizes_07052024.xlsx")

# Heights from bag 2 for 07/05/2024 showing up as NA's for some reason when data imported
B_growth$length.mm <- as.numeric(B_growth$length.mm)
B_growth$width.mm <- as.numeric(B_growth$width.mm)
B_growth$height.mm <- as.numeric(B_growth$height.mm)

# D survival
D_growth <- read_xlsx("/Users/graceleuchtenberger/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Documents/project-gigas-conditioning-GL/data/sizes/D_2023POGS_small_seed_weekly/D_sizes_07052024.xlsx")

```

### Means length
```{r}
means_B_sizes <- B_growth %>%
  group_by(conditioning, date) %>%
  summarise(mean_length = mean(length.mm, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean_width = mean(width.mm, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean_height = mean(height.mm, na.rm = TRUE), 
            .groups = 'drop')

means_D_sizes <- D_growth %>%
  group_by(conditioning, date) %>%
  summarise(mean_length = mean(length.mm, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean_width = mean(width.mm, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean_height = mean(height.mm, na.rm = TRUE), 
            .groups = 'drop')


```


```{r}

DL <- ggplot(means_D_sizes, aes(x = date, y = mean_length, color = conditioning)) +
   geom_point(size=3) +
  labs(x = "Date",
       y = "Mean live oysters per bag") +
  theme_classic()+
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),       
    axis.text.x = element_blank())+
  ylim(0,32)

DW <- ggplot(means_D_sizes, aes(x = date, y = mean_width, color = conditioning)) +
   geom_point(size=3) +
  labs(x = "Date",
       y = "Mean live oysters per bag") +
  theme_classic()+
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),       
    axis.text.x = element_blank())+
  ylim(0,32)

DH <- ggplot(means_D_sizes, aes(x = date, y = mean_height, color = conditioning)) +
   geom_point(size=3) +
  labs(x = "Date",
       y = "Mean live oysters per bag") +
  theme_classic()+
  ylim(0,32)

grid.arrange(DL,DW,DH)


```
